brand.name: JASIQ Labs
brand.tagline: We build careers, software, and AI products.

home.title: JASIQ Labs — Training, Services & Products
home.description: JASIQ Labs is a registered IT company offering training & internships, software & AI services, and products & AI research. Explore divisions and get in touch.

about.title: About JASIQ Labs — Vision, Mission & Trust
about.description: Learn about JASIQ Labs: our mission, story, values, leadership, and compliance details. Built for trust and long-term impact.

contact.title: Contact JASIQ Labs — Share Your Requirement
contact.description: Contact JASIQ Labs for training, services, partnerships, or product collaboration. Submit your details and we will respond soon.

hero.h1: JASIQ Labs builds careers, software, and AI products.
hero.supportingLine: Choose what you are looking for — training, services, or products — and we will guide you clearly.

items.title: Training & Internships
items.text: Mentor-led learning with real project practice. Designed for students who want job-ready skills.

items.title: Software & AI Services
items.text: We help startups and businesses build reliable software. Clear process, clean delivery, and long-term support.

items.title: Products & AI Research
items.text: We build products with a strong engineering mindset. Research-backed work focused on real problems.

cards.title: RealWorkStudio
cards.solves: Guides learners from basics to real projects with structured mentorship.

cards.title: TechWorksStudio
cards.solves: Builds software and AI solutions with clear planning and transparent delivery.

cards.title: Products & AI
cards.solves: Creates product-grade systems and AI research modules focused on practical value.

leadCapture.title: Get in touch
leadCapture.supportingLine: Share your details and interest. We will guide you to the right division.

about.missionText: Our mission is to build meaningful outcomes through learning, engineering, and product thinking — with clarity, discipline, and long-term impact.
about.storyText: JASIQ Labs was built with one simple goal: create a trustworthy and practical path for students, and deliver reliable software for businesses. We focus on clarity, process, and real results.
differentItems: Focus on long-term outcomes, not short-term hype
about.leadershipText: We are a team of builders and mentors who care about quality, trust, and consistency.
about.complianceText: We follow basic compliance practices for website policies, user data safety, and transparent communication. Company registration details can be added/updated via admin in later phases.
